TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName was attacked by an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.French: Votre %s1_UnitName [NUM1:a été attaqué:a été attaquée:ont été attaqués:a été attaquées] par [NUM2:un:une:des:des] %s2_EnUName ! (%d3_Damage%% de dégâts)
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName wurde von einer feindlichen Einheit %s2_EnUName angegriffen!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità di %s1_UnitName è stata attaccata dall'unità nemica di %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM2:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %s2_EnUName del enemigo [NUM2:ha:ha:han:han] atacado a [NUM1:vuestro:vuestra:vuestros:vuestras] %s1_UnitName (%d3_Damage%% de daño)

TEXT.English: An enemy %s2_EnUName attacked but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.French: An enemy %s2_EnUName attacked but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.German: An enemy %s2_EnUName attacked but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.Italian: An enemy %s2_EnUName attacked but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.Spanish: An enemy %s2_EnUName attacked but missed your %s1_UnitName!

TEXT.English: The %s2_EnUName returned fire and hit your %s1_UnitName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.French: The %s2_EnUName returned fire and hit your %s1_UnitName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.German: The %s2_EnUName returned fire and hit your %s1_UnitName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.Italian: The %s2_EnUName returned fire and hit your %s1_UnitName!(%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.Spanish: The %s2_EnUName returned fire and hit your %s1_UnitName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)

TEXT.English: The %s2_EnUName returned fire but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.French: The %s2_EnUName returned fire but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.German: The %s2_EnUName returned fire but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.Italian: The %s2_EnUName returned fire but missed your %s1_UnitName!
TEXT.Spanish: The %s2_EnUName returned fire but missed your %s1_UnitName!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat eine feindliche Einheit %s2_EnUName angegriffen!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità di %s1_UnitName ha attaccato un'unità nemica di %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM1:Vuestro:Vuestra:Vuestros:Vuestras] %s1_UnitName [NUM1:ha:ha:han:han] atacado a [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] %s2_EnUName del enemigo. (%d3_Damage%% de daño)

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked but missed an enemy %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked but missed an enemy %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.German: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked but missed an enemy %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked but missed an enemy %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked but missed an enemy %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire on an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.French: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire on an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.German: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire on an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire on an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire on an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire but missed the %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire but missed the %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.German: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire but missed the %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire but missed the %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1_UnitName has returned fire but missed the %s2_EnUName!
